title: REDice
author: REDice
content: *how much the budget to create a website this kind of service* advertising ( PTC )* cash in / cash out* exchange ( trx ltc doge xlm )* send money/ remittancei want to launch this kind of business

comments.author: Techdev
comments.body: I can help in discussion involving the roadmap and costs. Hit me up on Telegram: @ElevatedWarrior

comments.author: examplens
comments.body: Quote from: REDice on February 21, 2023, 02:21:16 PM*how much the budget to create a website this kind of service* advertising ( PTC )* cash in / cash out* exchange ( trx ltc doge xlm )* send money/ remittancei want to launch this kind of businessthere are several different businesses involved, you didn't say whether you want to fit them all in one place or keep them separate.it's always difficult to run this kind of online business if you don't have any knowledge about programming and how things work.To begin with, you can easily find one of the proven PTC scripts yourself. I think they cost between $30-$100 it is only important for you that the developers make regular upgrades and updates.About exchange, I assume you don't mean starting a full centralized exchange with accounting. that job requires a lot of money and a very good technical team that will do and maintain it all. again, if you don't have good prior knowledge, then I advise you not to get into it. The idea is not unique, plus the competition is very serious.Maybe you can consider services like Changelly, where you can use their API and very easily integrate instant exchange widgets on your site. cash in, send money is something completely different and think about it when you reach some reputation and trust.

comments.author: nioctib_100
comments.body: Any sort of exchange in today's time is too much for most people to handle, even competent teams. You'll need it to be extremely secure, works fast, complies with regulations, etc. It's really not worth it to do any sort of crypto exchange project at the moment.

comments.author: gunhell16
comments.body: Quote from: REDice on February 21, 2023, 02:21:16 PM*how much the budget to create a website this kind of service* advertising ( PTC )* cash in / cash out* exchange ( trx ltc doge xlm )* send money/ remittancei want to launch this kind of businessThese things you mentioned are one of them, first of all, the budget that you will need is not a joke, as in an exchange here in cryptocurrency, if in the DEX platform, a big budget is needed here, especially in a centralized exchange.Are these things you said OP you planned for a long time? I'm just asking. Because you will need a team in an exchange, then in remittance, that also requires a budget allocation. It's easy if you're a rich person, but if you're going to get rich, it's a bit difficult I think.

comments.author: joniboini
comments.body: Out of curiosity, why don't you build a marketplace that sells your current business products? I saw your post history and it seems like you already have a fashion business running. Launching a new business is not a bad move but the field you're trying to enter here is way too different, you'll probably end up hiring a lot of developers or buying many plugins that might not give you any ROI in the future because the competition is so brutal right now.If I were you, I'd try to expand my current business by investing in it. For example, building a marketplace as mentioned previously, spending some money for advertising in the forum or outside of it, opening a merchant account on other platforms that accept crypto, etc. But if you still want to do what you mentioned above, at the very least you should be prepared to spend hundred of dollars to buy plugins, hire developers, etc if you want to go with the budget option. Even a translation can cost you more than $400 per language if you want your website to support multiple languages (based on my experience). CMIIW.

comments.author: wiss19
comments.body: You can get some close estimates if you do a simple google search with each section as a query. Are you planning to start a single website with all those functionalities? I think that could become quite costly and also will require a lot of developing and maintaining work.If you are really serious, you can get a quote from developers on this forum (You can check the Services section to see if there are any developers providing services) or alternatively, you can check out freelance marketplaces such as Fiverr and Upwork to get a quote based on your requirements.

comments.author: REDice
comments.body: Quote from: joniboini on February 22, 2023, 01:23:02 PMOut of curiosity, why don't you build a marketplace that sells your current business products? I saw your post history and it seems like you already have a fashion business running. Launching a new business is not a bad move but the field you're trying to enter here is way too different, you'll probably end up hiring a lot of developers or buying many plugins that might not give you any ROI in the future because the competition is so brutal right now.If I were you, I'd try to expand my current business by investing in it. For example, building a marketplace as mentioned previously, spending some money for advertising in the forum or outside of it, opening a merchant account on other platforms that accept crypto, etc. But if you still want to do what you mentioned above, at the very least you should be prepared to spend hundred of dollars to buy plugins, hire developers, etc if you want to go with the budget option. Even a translation can cost you more than $400 per language if you want your website to support multiple languages (based on my experience). CMIIW.Â i will add more service to my business.

comments.author: GeethaFireBee
comments.body: Hi,Thanks for sharing your scope!!We shall implement your requirement with the 4 Cryptocurrencies in Exchange with -> Deposit & Withdraw-> Buy & Sell-> TradeFor more details please reach us atWhatsapp: +91 7397571188Skype ID: live:.cid.8fd54fe32544b574Feel free to share your instant mode of communication via DM.Geetha M

comments.author: rat03gopoh
comments.body: Including routine maintenance costs? I think the costs will be determined according to the demand for customization, complexity, features, or other things. And also the developer portfolio also affects the costs offered, if you want to be cheaper then hire novice developers.Quote from: REDice on February 25, 2023, 12:57:00 PM i will add more service to my business. You actually need permanent developers in this matter.

comments.author: joniboini
comments.body: Quote from: REDice on February 25, 2023, 12:57:00 PM i will add more service to my business. That's fair, but I believe starting so many different businesses at the same time is not gonna make it. Not to mention what you're looking for might cost a lot, which might not be worth the cost compared to expanding your existing business and making it more profitable. That being said, I'm not an expert on business management either so you do you.I think there is no other option other than following what has been suggested above. Ask for the price on the freelance marketplace or Services board if you don't know the market price. Don't just believe one source, wait for others to bid. Also, I suggest you keep it open to the public unless someone with a trade history sent you a PM. A lot of scammers are sending phishing links or even fake prices (which are usually very cheap but they don't accept escrow as a guarantee) nowadays. At the very least others can verify if someone is asking for ridiculously expensive prices or suspiciously cheap prices.

comments.author: seoincorporation
comments.body: Quote from: REDice on February 21, 2023, 02:21:16 PM*how much the budget to create a website this kind of serviceTo give a price and a time estimate you need to give a full description of what do you want, if you only describe each service with 1 word is impossible for us to estimate a budget and a working time.Quote from: REDice on February 21, 2023, 02:21:16 PM* advertising ( PTC )Do you want the users you get a Payment to Click? or you want to advertise your site in search engines and social networks?Quote from: REDice on February 21, 2023, 02:21:16 PM* cash in / cash outA deposit and withdrawal system it's easy to do with cryptos, you only need to have a server running your nodes and allow RCP calls.Quote from: REDice on February 21, 2023, 02:21:16 PM* exchange ( trx ltc doge xlm )Here you have to Options, you can use an exchange API or you can get your own exchange if you have the right balance for it. and exchange with low amounts of buy/sell isn't attractive to users.Quote from: REDice on February 21, 2023, 02:21:16 PM* send money/ remittancesame as depo/withdraw...Quote from: REDice on February 21, 2023, 02:21:16 PMi want to launch this kind of businessThis business doesn't even have a solid structure, think about the project and give it a shape before hire people for it.

comments.author: Emitdama
comments.body: Quote from: REDice on February 25, 2023, 12:57:00 PM i will add more service to my business. If you want what you mentioned in the opening post, and also want to make more expansions later on, then you will probably need a pretty high budget for that. Developing costs along with resources and other maintenance expenses will surely be costly.Quote from: rat03gopoh on February 26, 2023, 09:16:54 AMif you want to be cheaper then hire novice developers.Hiring novice developers wouldn't be a good idea for the long run. Experienced developers will surely cost more but the work they'll do will be free of bugs and issues that could be an hassle later on.
